name: Lottery
objective:
The number on the %%icon icon-egg$%% egg above the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron indicates which egg to put in the cauldron.

For example, if the egg says 4, then you have to put the 4th %%icon icon-egg$%% egg in the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron.

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% When a clone is created, it inherits the variables from its creator.

%%icon mdi mdi-alert-octagon-outline$%%Do not take the other %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs.
loss_reason_took_wrong_egg: One of the heroes took the wrong egg
